mapper.insert: insert into FJB_BMK (BMKID, IDTYPE, IDCARD, KSNAME, NETPSWORD, MOBICODE, EMAIL, BMTIME, ZKZH, SEX, NATION, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHTXL, HEIGHTXLOVERTIME, HEIGHTZY, HEIGHTXLSCHOOL, ADDR, PCCODE, KCH, KSDATE, KSTIMESID, KSTIMES, KSPC, PCID, PXFEES, ISPX, PXFEEMAN, PXFEEDATE, PXDATE, ISPRINTPASS, PSDATE, PSDATE2, STATUS, KSCOUNT, ISZCKS, KSSTATUS ) values (#{bmkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netpsword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.update: update FJB_BMK set IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSNAME = #{ksname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NETPSWORD = #{netpsword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBICODE = #{mobicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMTIME = #{bmtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZKZH = #{zkzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATION = mapper.select: select BMKID, IDTYPE, IDCARD, KSNAME, NETPSWORD, MOBICODE, EMAIL, BMTIME, ZKZH, SEX, NATION, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHTXL, HEIGHTXLOVERTIME, HEIGHTZY, HEIGHTXLSCHOOL, ADDR, ADDRESSDETAIL, PHONECODE, POSTCODE, BANKINFO, BANKCITY, BRANCH, ISCONFIRM, CHECKED, CHECKMAN, CHECKTIME, FEEMAN, FEETIME, CLFEES, KSFEES, MONEYS, FEESSTATUS, KSDQID, KSTIME, KSSOURCE, KSADDR, KCBH, PCCODE, KCH, KSDATE, KSTIMESID, KSTIMES, KSPC, PCID, PXFEES, ISPX, PXFEEMAN, PXFEEDATE, PXDATE, ISPRINTPASS, PSDATE, PSDATE2, STATUS, KSCOUNT, ISZCKS, KSSTATUS from FJB_BMK where BMKID = #{bmkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select BMKID, IDTYPE, IDCARD, KSNAME, NETPSWORD, MOBICODE, EMAIL, BMTIME, ZKZH, SEX, NATION, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHTXL, HEIGHTXLOVERTIME, HEIGHTZY, HEIGHTXLSCHOOL, ADDR, ADDRESSDETAIL, PHONECODE, POSTCODE, BANKINFO, BANKCITY, BRANCH, ISCONFIRM, CHECKED, CHECKMAN, CHECKTIME, FEEMAN, FEETIME, CLFEES, KSFEES, MONEYS, FEESSTATUS, KSDQID, KSTIME, KSSOURCE, KSADDR, KCBH, PCCODE, KCH, KSDATE, KSTIMESID, KSTIMES, KSPC, PCID, PXFEES, ISPX, PXFEEMAN, PXFEEDATE, PXDATE, ISPRINTPASS, PSDATE, PSDATE2, STATUS, KSCOUNT, ISZCKS, KSSTATUS from FJB_BMK
select count(*) from Fjb_BMK t where t.kstimesid = #{detailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1.*,t2.NATIONNAME,t3.ORIGINNAME as KSSOURCENAME,t4.AREANAME as KSDQNAME from FJB_BMK t1,FJB_NATION t2,FJB_ORIGIN t3,FJB_EXAMAREA t4 where t1.IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.nation = t2.nationid and t1.kssource = t3.originid and t1.ksdqid = t4.areaid

select BMKID, IDTYPE, IDCARD, KSNAME, NETPSWORD, MOBICODE, EMAIL, BMTIME, ZKZH, SEX, NATION, BIRTHDAY, HEIGHTXL, HEIGHTXLOVERTIME, HEIGHTZY, HEIGHTXLSCHOOL, ADDR, ADDRESSDETAIL, PHONECODE, POSTCODE, BANKINFO, BANKCITY, BRANCH, ISCONFIRM, CHECKED, CHECKMAN, CHECKTIME, FEEMAN, FEETIME, CLFEES, KSFEES, MONEYS, FEESSTATUS, KSDQID, KSTIME, KSSOURCE, KSADDR, KCBH, PCCODE, KCH, KSDATE, KSTIMESID, KSTIMES, KSPC, PCID, PXFEES, ISPX, PXFEEMAN, PXFEEDATE, PXDATE, ISPRINTPASS, PSDATE, PSDATE2, STATUS, KSCOUNT, ISZCKS, KSSTATUS from FJB_BMK where MOBICODE = #{mobicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
